TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Annotatable extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.IAnnotatable, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IMutableAnnotatable
type Annotatable = class interface IMutableAnnotatable interface IAnnotatable

summary.para: Base class for types that support reading and writing annotations.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.
